title: The S Before Ex
description: There's one thing even the tabloid hounds haven't managed to dig up about celebrity Ryan he is married! He may be one of America's most desirable men, but his secret wife has just filed for divorce.Since their separation six years ago, Claire has turned her life upside new business, new friends, new life. But when she sees Ryan to hash out a settlement, her body tells her one thing hasn't changedâ€”he's still the only man who really does it for her. With all other guys guaranteed to be totally meh, she's in last-chance it's either an X-rated fling with her ex, or straight to chastitybelts.com!
author: Mira Lyn Kelly
